page.title: 08QUERNMORE POST OFFICE 1
page.content: The post office is a non cash sub post office and deals with pensions,T.V. licences,green giros,recorded deliveries,registrations,overseas services,postal orders and stamps but does not handle savings,road fund licences etc.It is also a general store selling groceries,sweets,crisps, tinned food,ice cream,biscuits,soft drinks,cigarettes and news papers. Mrs.Ball manages the shop and says her busiest day is Friday and her quietest day is Wednesday.Most of her customers are regulars but the tourist trade is good particularly in summer. The most popular things that she sells are sweets,fizzy drinks and ice cream. They used to sell petrol but had to stop for safety reasons so the nearest petrol pump is now three miles away.
